import React, { useState, useEffect, createContext, useContext } from "react" import { Box, Center, Text, VStack, Table, TableContainer, Thead, Tr, Th, Tbody, Td, IconButton, Avatar, AvatarGroup, } from "@chakra-ui/react" import { SearchIcon } from "@chakra-ui/icons" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" // Context for user data const UserContext = createContext(undefined) interface User { id: number name: string } export const Home: React.FC = () => { const [users, setUsers] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetch("https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data: User[]) => setUsers(data)) .catch((error) => console.error("Error fetching data:", error)) }, []) return ( USERS' DASHBOARD
{users.map((user) => ( ))}
User Photo Name User Profile Info
{user.name} } /> } />
) }
